Reviews.Title: “Good place for an early flight”
Reviews.Author: Snout117
Reviews.Content: This was a decent place, nothing too special about it. The room was cramped, but had everything you could want. The front desk staff were excellent and attentive to our needs. If I had a complaint it was how you arranged to get the airport shuttle. I returned our rental car to the airport and needed to get back to the hotel. I assumed there was a courtesy phone to contact the hotel, for me that's the norm. I found out that you actually had to call the front desk of the hotel to get the shuttle to pick you up. Who carries around the front desk phone number of their hotel? It took a few phone calls and significant roaming charges to figure out the front desk phone number to arrange pickup. Once sorted, the shuttle was quick getting to me and the driver was very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Janice S
Reviews.Content: Staying at this property was fantastic. Breakfast selections were varied and delicious. Tuesday-Thursay there is a cocktail hour -- food and drinks! Our guest room consisted of a two bed bedroom, a bath, sitting room, and a small kitchen. The location near the airport was convenient to all areas of Orlando. All for a reasonable price for four people!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: Philly_Fan_01
Reviews.Content: Excellent value at less than $100/night which includes free breakfast, wireless internet, and parking. Plus got extra priority rewards points for my week-long stay. Was in Florida to attend a class held at the nearby Marriott, which was only a 2 minute walk to the nearby Marriott, which cost significantly more. Saved over $50/night compared to staying at the Marriott, which charged extra for parking, in-room internet, and did not include breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel for the value and with a large traveling family.”
Reviews.Author: Mamacitababy
Reviews.Content: We have been staying in Orlando for a few days now and have stayed in several hotels, from the time we checked in to this hotel, it was two thumbs up for me, my husband and my four kids! We enjoyed the very, very clean room (we have not had this clean of a room at any of the other hotels we have stayed in thus far) The beds are amazing, there was plenty of room for our family of 6. There was even a DVD player, that was great for our kids to watch their movies. The room came complete with everything you would need to prepare a meal, cook, clean and sleep. Complementary Breakfast, parking and pool was a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent and helpful staff!”
Reviews.Author: Highexpectation
Reviews.Content: We were boarding an airplane early in the morning, so decided to stay close to the airport. Using booking.com we came across Staybridge Suites. For less than $100, we were able to get a two room suite with a king bed and pull out couch. The hotel staff was extremely helpful when we were decided how to get to the airport the next morning. The hotel offers a shuttle service, but it only leaves on the hour and takes about a 45 minute ride for a 5 minute trip. With triplet 5 year olds, this wasn't going to work. The front desk made arrangements for us to take a taxi and we didn't have to do a thing but show up at the designated time and pay the driver ($14). It was definitely worth the money to be dropped off right at our airline with no worries of being late, or having to wait on others. The hotel offers many amenities, but we were mainly there for the location. The room was clean and the free breakfast was amazing. We would definitely stay at Staybridge Suites Orlando Airport South again!

Reviews.Title: “Jessica is the best!”
Reviews.Author: LadyJKin
Reviews.Content: Very friendly front desk staff, my 2nd time at this hotel, she and Maggie helped me find a good place to have dinner. Rooms are spacious, hot tub could be a bit cleaner. The kitchen staff could be a bit friendlier. Breakfast was good, managers reception was ok, could have used a veggie item as well. Over all good value for money. Will return.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Perfect Stay”
Reviews.Author: Chicagojetsetter
Reviews.Content: Very nice front desk staff, clean room, spacious, No issues. Lots of food options nearby and a stones throw from the airport. Nice price too.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for an early flight”
Reviews.Author: SJB2011
Reviews.Content: I stayed here to be close to the airport as I had an early morning flight. The price was very reasonable in comparison to the local hotels in the surrounding area. Overall I was quite happy with everything. The rooms were huge. (We got upgraded to a 2 bedroom for free) and it was like a mini apartment. The rooms were very clean for the most part- the washrooms were lacking a bit in cleanliness but this is something I am always quite anal about. I need a washroom to be spotless, mould free, etc. We had a very noisy air conditioning unit so that was a little annoying at night. We ended up turning it off and dealing with being hot just to rest. Front desk staff were courteous and friendly. Smooth check in and check out. The shuttle to the airport was free and on-time. Super convenient and easy. I did not have to worry. They do offer quite the spread for breakfast which is complimentary. Unfortunately we left just as it was being set up so we did not get to enjoy it but from what I saw it looked great. We would definitely return again if we need a hotel close to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious Clean & Close To Airport”
Reviews.Author: jelh
Reviews.Content: The suites were excellent very clean and well equipped breakfast was okay but hard to find a place to sit due to number of guests. We will stay again good value for money

Reviews.Title: “It's a winner”
Reviews.Author: mungoman
Reviews.Content: This is the first time we have filed a review while still staying at the hotel. Tucked in an enclave of airport hotels, the Staybridge Suites Orlando Airport South is a winner with its apartment-style suite, well-equipped kitchen and big, comfortable comfortable bed. Very and clean and surprisingly quiet considering it's only 1.5 miles from a busy airport. The staff is very friendly and efficient. We are booked in for four nights before flying out and will come back here on our return to MCO.

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: minson
Reviews.Content: To start with the rooms were fantastic.Just like the pictures.The rooms must have been redone recently because the place was new and very clean.The kitchen was great to have since we were there for a week.We did disney and universal both about a quick 20 min.ride.The buffet breakfast was great.We could get up eat and hit the parks.A few times a week they also had free appetizers and draft beer and wine between 5-7 pm.I would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at Staybridge”
Reviews.Author: askmey
Reviews.Content: Nice size room with kitchenette, living area, and separate bedroom. Sundowner refreshments offered tue-thur evening which were a nice touch if nothing fancy. Breakfast is very good. The site is attractive, although being an airport hotel you do have a certain amount of noise. The two gas stations nearest will gouge you but drive six blocks further down Samoran Dr and you will find reasonably priced gas. Plenty of restaurants and bars near the hotel as well as other shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: MGabil
Reviews.Content: We were already in Orlando but decided to come stay here one night to be near the airport since a few family members had a very early morning flight to catch. We had a 2 bedroom suite and were very impressed. The check in and check out was smooth and the shuttle to the airport was great. I actually had some extra time in the morning before my flight so I took the 20 minute drive to downtown Disney for my little one to enjoy. The rooms were super clean and had a great layout and being so close to the freeway we were able to take drives to different parts of town and return to the hotel between trips no problem. I actually booked a different location by accident but called this location to let them know and they were amazing at not just getting us 2 bedroom for the same day but also matched the price I had booked at the other location (thank you Eric!!). They also have a free breakfast but we missed it :( My only concern was the back door where we parked and unloaded/loaded our luggage is supposed to have key access (room key) but was actually broken so that anyone can just walk in and out - not very safe.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay.”
Reviews.Author: MarkIreland76
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful one night stay. Check in was a breeze, got upgraded to a 2 bedroom suite and staff very friendly yet. Comfortable bed and fresh furnishings. Evening reception was great, hot and fresh chicken tenders, fries and salad, along with free drinks, breakfast was just fine, usual Staybridge offerings. Wonderful stay before a morning flight, can't think of anything to complain about.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful intelligent knowledgeable staff”
Reviews.Author: retiredmediator
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night with 3 children under 5 as it was very close to airport. Great value for money - Front desk staff on all 3 shifts were very helpful with directions to stores and courtesy shuttle to airport. Lots of places to eat close by. Hotel had a free tasty spaghetti supper.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel close to Orlando airport”
Reviews.Author: Jorgen036
Reviews.Content: We, two persons, stayed one night before leaving Orlando in the morning. The hotel was nice and with a friendly staff. A very positive surprise was that the hotel offers hamburger and bier free of charge at the happy hour in the afternoon. The complimentary hot breakfast buffet was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Nice change of pace”
Reviews.Author: Justin P
Reviews.Content: Make it simple- -Friendly staff (I interacted with front desk, houskeeping, breakfast and bar staff) -Rooms were large, comfortable new and clean- not sure what the other review is going on about, but I guess it is like a restaurant, you can always get good or even poor service -Awesome that it was pet friendly, major bonus -Enjoyed the free beer/wine on Thursday night -Great value for size of room, amenities -Free parking Will definitely come back and maybe stay at other Staybridge's when I travel.

Reviews.Title: “HAIR ALL OVER OUR "CLEAN ROOM"”
Reviews.Author: wmauwer
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is great 4 minutes from airport so I have a problem with why we waited 37 minutes to get picked up. Upon arrival front desk staff was very friendly and yes they where trying to kiss butt because they had no explanation for the wait at the airport. When we got into our room I wanted to take shower well nasty black hairs in the bath tub . I just put a towel over them and showered didnt wanna wait hours for a staff member to do something about it . At the dinner or sundowner as they call it at the bar I over heard a few pilots that where there in training talking about how unsafe the hotel was numerous items stolen from rooms including a lap top very recently by a housekeeping staff member along with cars beng broken into all the time .From my understanding the general manager refuses to get security .he must think because he lives on property he is security. We woke up first thing at 5am and got the hell out of that place. Mr.kenyon do your job or your hotel will never be better than # 242 out of 341 in orlando thats higher than you should be to be honest this hotel is low class and the rankings show it .

Reviews.Title: “Now Called Staybridge Suites”
Reviews.Author: Kandra R
Reviews.Content: Issues started right at checkout. We had the printout of the reservation for a 2 Bedroom Suite and they had a 1 Bedroom, same issue one of the couples we were traveling with. The other couple, they did not hve their reservation at all. Hotel is very poorly managed. They did not have a listing of places to eat close to the hotel, they did not know what facilities were in the 2 mile radius of the free hotel shuttle. We had a banquet there and the food was served 30 minutes late, and was refrigerator cold. We had to bring in Microwaves from the hotel rooms to serve the food. My husband went and got the pictures of ice tea, we went bck to our rooms to get water to drink, no salt or pepper on the tables. Dessert was served more than an hour after dinner. What a disaster. When we went to print our boarding passes, the keyboard for the computer in the business center had half the letters worn off. This was a group of Navy veterans from WWII - even the Navy representative at our banquet was embarrassed. (He had nothing to do with the Hotel). Staff was friendly, but knowledge level was poor.

Reviews.Title: “Hawthorn Suites / Staybridge”
Reviews.Author: firiesclose
Reviews.Content: Great layout to room. 2 large beds, seperate sitting and kitchen area, sperate bathroom to bedroom. Very clean, everthing looked new, loads of tv channels. Only stayed 1 night pre cruise. Only negative was the shuttle service, this hotel is no longer called Hawthorn Suites it is now Staybridge. I rang hotel at airport, advised shuttle would be there shortly. Waited 20 mins rang again - only then did she say the name had changed, 1 hr later and 3rd phone call the shuttle collected us. If the receptionist had used her brain and told me what name was on shuttle I would have been at the hotel 20 mins after landing. Had been up and travelling for 16 hours so extra hour waiting was very frustrating.

HotelInfo.Name: Staybridge Suites Orlando Airport South
HotelInfo.Address: 7450 Augusta National Drive, Orlando, FL 32822 (Formerly Hawthorn Suites by Wyndham Orlando, Augusta)
